verses.verse: For the director.[b] According to Mahalath. A maskil of David.
[c]The fool says in his heart, “There is no God.” Such are depraved and their deeds are vile; there is no one who does what is right.
God looks down from heaven upon the entire human race, to see if there are any who act with wisdom, if even a single one seeks God.
But they have all turned aside; all alike are corrupt. There is no one who does what is right, not even one.
Have all these evildoers no understanding? They devour my people as they eat bread, and they never call out to God.

Later, they will be filled with terror, and with good reason,[d] although now they do not fear. For God will scatter the bones of those who attack you; they will be put to shame, for God has rejected them.
